headline: Ford CEO Recalls Being ‘Humbled’ By Tesla. Now EV Sales Are Stagnating.
summary: Competing with disruptors isn’t always easy for established companies. Disruptive technology, however, doesn’t always directly equate to stock market performance.

raw.headline: Ford CEO Recalls Being ‘Humbled’ By Tesla. Now EV Sales Are Stagnating.
raw.summary: Competing with disruptors isn’t always easy for established companies. Disruptive technology, however, doesn’t always directly equate to stock market performance.

headline: GM, Ford Become World’s Greatest Car Companies
summary: Ford and General Motors stocks trade at highs even though both automakers have failed in the electric vehicle segment, especially in China and Europe.

raw.headline: GM, Ford Become World’s Greatest Car Companies
raw.summary: Ford and General Motors stocks trade at highs even though both automakers have failed in the electric vehicle segment, especially in China and Europe.

headline: Ford Brings Hands-Free BlueCruise Tech to the Masses
summary: Ford today announced expanded availability of BlueCruise,1 giving thousands more customers access to "hands-off, eyes-on" highway driving.

raw.headline: Ford Brings Hands-Free BlueCruise Tech to the Masses
raw.summary: Ford today announced expanded availability of BlueCruise,1 giving thousands more customers access to "hands-off, eyes-on" highway driving.
